name: Expiry Date
description:
You are a doctor, who must collect all the pills scattered across the "hospital" and give them to your patient. Unfortunately, the hospital's budget doesn't let you purchase fresh medicines and the medicines are just about to expire, so you must be quick!

But because the medicines are so old, they have some unintended side effects when you touch them. Can you endure these effects and treat your patient?

Controls
  • W to Jump
  • AD to move
Credits
  • Neucha Font by Jovanny Lemonad
  • Code, Art and Sounds by CodeBoi (Discord: CodeBoi#3680)
